page.description: Removes path from a table filename if table is in database. In case of set returns stripped names of all tables in the set.
page.syntax: OutputString as C = strip_table_paths(C table_set_name [,L expand_set ])

argument.name: table_set_name
argument.description: The fully qualified name of a table or set.

argument.name: expand_set
argument.description: Optional. Default = .F. .T. = Generate a list of tables included in the set. .F. = Do not generate a list.

page.discussion: STRIP_TABLE_PATHS() returns the name of the table or set without path information. When the optional Expand_Set argument is set to .T. (True), it creates a list of table names.
